-e ---

# 𐘂 𐀞 𐝀 = 𒉺 PA (Linear A/B/C / Sumerian) ⇔ π 𐀡 po

𐀞 pa 󲇇 󲅑 󲅒 󲅏 󲉉 󲅐 󲍳 󲊹 󲎬 󲊞 󲊆 󲍇 󲎞 󲊯 󲊘 path 𓈘 pons 𒉺𒁕𒉡 padanu pátos <> póntos ‘sea’

𐀞-𐀞-𐀫 pa-pa-ro barbarian (not from pylos)

𐀞-𐀳 pa-te® 1. father πατήρ

𐀞-𐀳 pa-te 2. √ pan all ⇔ πατήρ nominative plural masculine of pa ⇔ πᾶς pa-te1 + de
𐀞-𐀳-𐀒-𐀵 pa-te-ko-to all-building
𐀞-𐀺-𐀐-𐀳 pa-wo-ke-te all the workers
𐀞-𐀯-𐀳-𐀃-𐀂 pa-si-te-o-i •to all the gods (πᾶς theoi)

𐀞-𐀨 para before (preposition)
𐀞-𐀨-𐀍 pa-ra-jo old ^^ ⇔ gero ⇔ 𐀟-𐀩-𐁚 pe-re-*82 •theonym 'old man' ⇔ πρέσβυς
𐀞-𐀁-𐀃-𐀳 pa-e-o-te present
𐀞-𐀅-𐀋-𐀄 pa-da-je-u priest in pa-de(-we) sanctuary

𐀞-𐀐-𐀳-𐀩 pa-ke-te-re piquet, stake παλούκι paloúki Pfahl, Pflock pālus paalu pal paliseto

𐀞-𐀿 pa-zo wise sage ⇔ 𓊪 𓏏 𓂋 photor > video *weyd- see, behold >> ἀΐδηλος wit գիւտ giwt gewit विद्या vidyā́
𐀞-𐀒-𐀸 pa-ko-we sage

𐀞 ⋍ 𓃀 πᾶν ⇔ Bein podi 𓃀𓃀

𐀞-𐀲-𐀍 pa-ta-jo arrows <<
